column2: There  shall  be  a  consensus  between  the  Board  and  the
Trade Unions for a salary hike, which shall be included in

the  Collective  Agreement  to  maintain 
industrial  peace
within the CEB (which happens one in three years), and;
If  there  is  such  a  consensus,  for  it  to  take  effect,  the

approvals 
from 
the  Secretary/Ministry  of  Power  and
Energy, Secretary/Ministry of Finance and Planning, and
the Cabinet of Ministers are necessary.
